name: Dinosaur Dating Simulator
description:
Dinosaur Dating Simulator is a dating sim merged with turn-based combat. You are a lone dinosaur who has woken up in the modern world and you are trying to find a compatible mate to repopulate your species.

Made for Ludum Dare 41 and Weekly Game Jam 41.

Timelapse

Credits:

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio 1.4
  • Graphics made using Krita and GIMP
  • Sound FX made using ChipTone
  • Hyper Mega Ultrastorm and Cipher by Kevin MacLeod
